verses.verse: <S%H8104>Keep<s%> thy <S%H7272>foot<s%> when thou <S%H3212>goest<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and be more <S%H7138>ready<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%>, than to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%>: for they <S%H3045>consider<s%> not that they <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>.

Be not <S%H926>rash<s%> with thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and let not thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H4116>hasty<s%> to <S%H3318>utter<s%> any <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>: for <S%H430>God<s%> is in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and thou upon <S%H776>earth<s%>: therefore let thy <S%H1697>words<s%> be <S%H4592>few<s%>.

For a <S%H2472>dream<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> through the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H6045>business<s%>; and a <S%H3684>fool's<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%> is known by <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H1697>words<s%>.

When thou <S%H5087>vowest<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H309>defer<s%> not to <S%H7999>pay<s%> it; for he hath no <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> in <S%H3684>fools<s%>: <S%H7999>pay<s%> that which thou hast <S%H5087>vowed<s%>.
<S%H2896>Better<s%> is it that thou shouldest not <S%H5087>vow<s%>, than that thou shouldest <S%H5087>vow<s%> and not <S%H7999>pay<s%>.

<S%H5414>Suffer<s%> not thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to cause thy <S%H1320>flesh<s%> to <S%H2398>sin<s%>; neither <S%H559>say<s%> thou <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%>, that it was an <S%H7684>error<s%>: wherefore should <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H7107>angry<s%> at thy <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and <S%H2254>destroy<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of thine <S%H3027>hands<s%>?
For in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H2472>dreams<s%> and <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> there are also divers <S%H1892>vanities<s%>: but <S%H3372>fear<s%> thou <S%H430>God<s%>.

¶ If thou <S%H7200>seest<s%> the <S%H6233>oppression<s%> of the <S%H7326>poor<s%>, and <S%H1499>violent<s%> perverting of <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and <S%H6664>justice<s%> in a <S%H4082>province<s%>, <S%H8539>marvel<s%> not at the <S%H2656>matter<s%>: for he that is <S%H1364>higher<s%> than the <S%H1364>highest<s%> <S%H8104>regardeth<s%>; and there be <S%H1364>higher<s%> than <S%H5921>they<s%>.
¶ Moreover the <S%H3504>profit<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> is for all: the <S%H4428>king<s%> himself is <S%H5647>served<s%> by the <S%H7704>field<s%>.

He that <S%H157>loveth<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> shall not be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H3701>silver<s%>; nor he that <S%H157>loveth<s%> <S%H1995>abundance<s%> with <S%H8393>increase<s%>: this is also <S%H1892>vanity<s%>.

When <S%H2896>goods<s%> <S%H7235>increase<s%>, they are <S%H7231>increased<s%> that <S%H398>eat<s%> them: and what <S%H3788>good<s%> is there to the <S%H1167>owners<s%> thereof, <S%H518>saving<s%> the <S%H7207%H7212>beholding<s%> of them with their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>?

The <S%H8142>sleep<s%> of a labouring <S%H5647>man<s%> is <S%H4966>sweet<s%>, whether he <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4592>little<s%> or <S%H7235>much<s%>: but the <S%H7647>abundance<s%> of the <S%H6223>rich<s%> will not <S%H3240>suffer<s%> him to <S%H3462>sleep<s%>.

There <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H2470>sore<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> which I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, namely, <S%H6239>riches<s%> <S%H8104>kept<s%> for the <S%H1167>owners<s%> thereof to their <S%H7451>hurt<s%>.
But those <S%H6239>riches<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%> by <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H6045>travail<s%>: and he <S%H3205>begetteth<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>, and there is <S%H3972>nothing<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

As he came <S%H3318>forth<s%> of his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H990>womb<s%>, <S%H6174>naked<s%> shall he <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> as he <S%H935>came<s%>, and shall <S%H5375>take<s%> <S%H3972>nothing<s%> of his <S%H5999>labour<s%>, which he may carry <S%H3212>away<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And <S%H2090>this<s%> also is a <S%H2470>sore<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>, that in all <S%H5980>points<s%> as he <S%H935>came<s%>, so shall he <S%H3212>go<s%>: and what <S%H3504>profit<s%> hath he that hath <S%H5998>laboured<s%> for the <S%H7307>wind<s%>?
All his <S%H3117>days<s%> also he <S%H398>eateth<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, and he hath <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H3707>sorrow<s%> and <S%H7110>wrath<s%> with his <S%H2483>sickness<s%>.

¶ Behold that which I have <S%H7200>seen<s%>: it is <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3303>comely<s%> for one to <S%H398>eat<s%> and to <S%H8354>drink<s%>, and to <S%H7200>enjoy<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> of all his <S%H5999>labour<s%> that he <S%H5998>taketh<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H4557>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life<s%>, which <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> him: for it is his <S%H2506>portion<s%>.

Every <S%H120>man<s%> also to whom <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%> and <S%H5233>wealth<s%>, and hath given him <S%H7980>power<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof, and to <S%H5375>take<s%> his <S%H2506>portion<s%>, and to <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in his <S%H5999>labour<s%>; <S%H2090>this<s%> is the <S%H4991>gift<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

For he shall not <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life<s%>; because <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6031>answereth<s%> him in the <S%H8057>joy<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
